name: Megaton Musashi
overview: Megaton Musashi (メガトン級ムサシ) is a robot action/RPG that follows a group of kids who pilot giant robots to save the earth from an alien invasion! Enjoy battles that make full use of flashy special moves with your own customized "rogue"! And in story mode, a rich adventure full of unique characters unfolds! It also supports multi-cooperative play so you can join forces with friends in battle!
